title: Did California Issue ‘Unlawful’ Mail-In Ballots?
subtitle: A ruling from a Sutter County judge said an executive order issued by California Gov. Gavin Newsom was "void" and "unconstitutional."
author: Jordan Liles
vclaim: The state of California issued "unlawful" mail-in ballots, and the outcome of the 2020 U.S. presidential election is in jeopardy.
